jobInfo.postDescription:
福利：

固定13薪
年终奖
年假：带薪15天起，最多20天；
病假：带薪10天；
社保：按上限
医保：按上限
公积金：公司12%，个人12%，按实际工资基数计算。
加班费：按劳动法实发。
职位描述：
1. 电表产品测试与认证和业务开发。
2.准备项目技术文件，并按照有关标准，法规对试验结果进行评估。
3.在制造商的现场进行现场测试。
4.为客户和团队成员提供专业，可靠和快速的信息。
5.研究新的标准/决议/知识。
6.与客户进行有效沟通，与客户建立并保持良好的关系。
7.与其他同事合作以实现目标。
8.完成上级的临时任务。
9.为客户提供研讨会，培训和技术顾问
10. 联系外部实验室，寻找测试资源，维护外部实验室关系。


职位需要：
1. 电子、电气等理工科的本科或以上学历。
2. 考虑优秀应届生。
3. 优先考虑熟悉欧盟/国际/GB电表产品相关的标准，如IEC 62052，IEC 62053，EN 50470-x，GB 17215.x等标准。
4. 优先考虑熟悉电源产品IEC 60950-1 和IEC 62368-1标准的安规工程师。
5. 优先考虑有UPS，逆变器，变流器等电力电子产品研发、测试和认证行业的工作经验。
6. 沟通良好，团队合作精神和客户服务意识，工作踏实，有良好的学习能力。
7. 能阅读并理解英文技术资料、英文标准并完成英文数据、文档和报告等，有必要用英语进行基本交流。
8.熟悉MS办公软件。
9.乐于学习新知识。
10. 能够在压力下工作，以服务客户为优先，以完成项目目标为优先。

Job Description:
1. Certification and testing Business Development in electricity meter industry.
2. Preparing technical documents of project and evaluate test results according to relevant standards and regulations.
3. Conducting on-site testing on manufacturer's site.
4. Providing professional, reliable and quick information to clients and team members.
5. Studying new standards/decisions/knowledge.
6. Communicating with clients efficiently, establishing and maintaining good relationship with clients.
7. Cooperating with other colleagues to achieve the targets.
8. Completing ad hoc assignments by superior.
9. Provide workshops, trainings and technical consultants to customers
10. connections with external labs


Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor's degree or above, major in electronics and electrical engineering or similar area.
2. Excellent fresh graduates could be considered.
3. Familiar with EU/IEC/GB standards, such  as IEC 62052，IEC 62053，EN 50470-x，GB 17215.x and etc is preferred.
4. Safety engineers knowing IEC 60950-1 and IEC 62368-1 for power supply is also preferred.
5. Working experience in UPS，inverter ，converter、Power Electronics products R&D, testing and certification industry is preferred.
6. Good communication skills, team spirit and customer service sense.
7. Good at English reading, basic communication in English is necessary.
8. Familiar with MS offices.
9. Willing to learn new knowledges.
10. Able to work under pressure. „customer first“ and ”project objective first“.
jobInfo.address: 深圳光明区光明银星合成生物产业园2A栋

brandComInfo.introduce:
关于德国莱茵TÜV大中华区

德国莱茵TÜV集团作为国际知名的独立第三方检验、 检测和认证机构， 拥有超过140年的经验，在全球五大洲69 个国家设有500家分支机构， 全球员工数超过19,600， 能提供全球客户所需的专业服务支持。 德国莱茵TÜV大中华区员工约 3,800 人，服务范围包含工业及能源服务、电子电气产品测试、通讯测试、消费品测试、人体工学评估、交通服务、轨道系统安全、绿色产品认证、莱茵学院与生命关怀及管理体系等检验认证服务。
德国莱茵TÜV 向来以严谨高质量的测试认证服务著称，并以公正独立的角度提供各项专业评估，为当地企业提供符合安全、质量以及环保的优质服务和解决方案。
www.tuv.com

About TÜV Rheinland Greater China 

An internationally renowned independent third-party testing, inspection and
certification organization, TÜV Rheinland possesses more than 140 years of experience, has 500 service locations in 69 countries on 5 continents, employs over 19,600 people worldwide, and provides professional service support to clients around the world. TÜV Rheinland employs approximately 3,800 people in the Greater China region, offering testing and certification services such as industrial and renewable energy services, electrical and electronic product testing, telecom testing,
fast-moving consumer products testing, ergonomics evaluation, mobility, railway safety, green solutions, academy & life care and management system. TÜV Rheinland has long been synonymous with rigorous
high-quality testing and certification services and for providing a variety of
professional assessments from an impartial and independent perspective. We
provide local companies with quality services and solutions that comply with
safety, quality, and environmental-friendly requirements. 

www.tuv.com
